org.nepas.sbg

Class SBGComClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nepas.sbg.SBGComClass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SBGComClass
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class to export SBG Communication Library functions to Java applications.

    This class implements some SBG Library functions to open device connection and gets output data.

    Output data can be gotten either:

    • using read() method (user control mode); or
    • using startContinuousOutput() method (continuous output mode).
    Version:
    1.0, 2023-05-10
    Author:
    Alexandre Jos√© Tiberti

    • Field Detail

      • sbgLibName

        public static java.lang.String sbgLibName
        Contains the dynamic library name with Java SBG native methods. Standard name is 'sbgcomlib'.

        If library name is different from standard name, change it before calling SBGComClass constructor at first time!

    • Constructor Detail

      • SBGComClass

        public SBGComClass()
        Standard constructor.

        This constructor loads and initializes SBG native method library at first call.
        The library name is defined into sbgLibName field.
        An exception is thrown on error.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String devName,
                    long baudRate)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Connects to SBG device.

        This method initializes the SBGCom library, opens the COM port and trys to get the default output mask and output mode from SBG device.

        Parameters:
        devName - communication port to open ("COMX" on Windows, "/dev/ttyX" on UNIX platforms)
        baudRate - baud rate used to communicate with the device (9600, 19200, 38400, 57600, 115200, ...)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a SBG device error occurred.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the current connection with SBG device.

        This method closes the COM port and release memory for the sbgCom library.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a SBG device error occurred.

      • read

        public void read(long outMask,
                 SBGOutput outData)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Gets output data from connected SBG device.

        This method asks the SBG device to return a specific combination of output data.
        Use this method only if you have implemented a self read control.
        If you are using startContinuousOutput() method, don't use this method! It may cause several errors.

        Parameters:
        outMask - an 'or' bitwise combination of SBGOutput.OUTPUT_* constants, used to define which outputs should be returned into outData object.
        outData - specific combination of output data returned by SBG device.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a SBG device error occurred.

      • startContinuousOutput

        public void startContinuousOutput(SBGComListener outListener,
                                  long outMask,
                                  long outTime)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Starts continuous SBG device output data.

        This method creates a thread to get SBG output data every outTime milliseconds.
        It doens't nothing if another thread is running.
        Use this method only if you are implemented a SBGComListener interface to handle SBG device continuous output data.

        Parameters:
        outListener - SBG device output listener object.
        outMask - an 'or' bitwise combination of SBGOutput.OUTPUT_* constants, used to define which outputs should be returned by SBG device.
        outTime - time interval between SBG output data in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a SBG device error occurred.

      • stopContinuousOutput

        public void stopContinuousOutput()
                          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Stops continuous SBG device output data.

        This method stops thread started by startContinuousOutput() method.
        It doens't nothing if thread isn't created.

        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If a thread interruption error occurred.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Checks if the connection with SBG device has been established by connect() method.
        Returns:
        true if SBG device is connected.

      • getErrorMsg

        public java.lang.String getErrorMsg(int error)
        Converts a SBG error code into a human readable string.

        This getter method has been defined for SBGComListener.sgbError() event to get an error in string format.

        Parameters:
        error - error code returned by SBG native methods.
        Returns:
        a string with the error code description.

      • throwSGBError

        protected void throwSGBError(int error)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Throws a SBG device error.

        This method is used internally by SBG device handling methods to throw an exception on error.

        Parameters:
        error - error code returned by SBG native methods, -1 unconnected.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception with SBG device error.

      • run

        public void run()
        Continuous SBG output data.

        Don't call this method directly! It is only used by internal continuous output treads!

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
